contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: We'd love to hear from you. Please fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.faqJoinAnswer: You can join Ring by registering on our platform. Once registered, you can create a profile for your organization and start connecting with others in the tech ecosystem.
contact.faqOpportunities: What kind of opportunities can I find on Ring?
contact.faqOpportunitiesAnswer: Ring offers a wide range of opportunities including job postings, partnership proposals, investment opportunities, and collaboration requests within the tech industry.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to the Ring App Privacy Policy. This policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: We collect the following types of information:
dataCollection.item1: Personal information you provide when creating an account
dataCollection.item3: Data related to opportunities you create or interact with

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Data
dataUsage.content: We use your data to provide and improve our services, facilitate connections between users, and ensure the security of our platform.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, and destruction.

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You can also opt-out of certain data collection practices.

contactUsPrivacy.title: Contact Us
contactUsPrivacy.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@ring.ck.ua.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to the Ring App Terms of Service. By using our platform, you agree to these terms.

userAgreement.title: User Agreement
userAgreement.content: By accessing or using Ring App, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service.

accountResponsibilities.title: Account Responsibilities
accountResponsibilities.content: As a user of Ring App, you are responsible for:
accountResponsibilities.item1: Maintaining the confidentiality of your account
accountResponsibilities.item2: All activities that occur under your account
accountResponsibilities.item3: Ensuring that all information you provide is accurate and up-to-date

contentGuidelines.title: Content Guidelines
contentGuidelines.content: Users are prohibited from posting content that is illegal, abusive, or violates the rights of others.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content and materials available on Ring App are protected by intellectual property rights.

limitationOfLiability.title: Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.content: Ring App is not liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your account at our sole discretion, without notice, for conduct that we believe violates these Terms of Service or is harmful to other users, us, or third parties, or for any other reason.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may modify these Terms of Service at any time. We will notify users of any significant changes.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at terms@ring.ck.ua.

hero.title: DAARION DAO
hero.subtitle: Ukrainian Agro-Tech Startup - Digital Cooperative of the New Millennium

mission.title: Our Vision
mission.description: Creating a decentralized autonomous organization (DAO) on the Web 3.0 platform and developing a blockchain ecosystem and metaverse for sustainable microeconomics.
mission.details: We aim to support small farmers and organic producers by providing access to resources, markets, and financing.

land.title: Producer Support
land.description: Providing branding opportunities and marketing support through cooperatives.

network.title: Technological Innovation
network.description: Utilizing DAO for tokenization and decentralization of exchanges/payments between users.

token.title: DAAR Organic Token
token.description: Digital certificate for farmers for barter trade. 1 DAAR = 1 liter of Acacia honey or 2.4 kg of amaranth.

income.title: Staking
income.description: Opportunity to earn an annual income of 4% through staking.

investment.title: Why Invest in DAARION?
investment.description: A unique Ukrainian project combining agriculture with innovation and cryptocurrencies, paving the way for outstanding opportunities in the agricultural sector's future development.

location.title: Growing Market
location.description: The healthy food market is growing by 20-30% annually.

technology.title: Innovative Technologies
technology.description: Greenfood combines social networks, ecology, and supports small businesses.

returns.title: Transparency
returns.description: A dedicated team of journalists and bloggers ensures coverage of the production process.

trust.title: Cooperative Governance
trust.description: 1 Token = 1 Cooperative Vote, ensuring democratic decision-making.

income.title: Platform Profit
income.description: 20% of profits are generated through the Greenfood.live platform.

token.title: How to Buy and Earn with DAAR
token.description: Become a co-owner of the revolutionary agricultural project through tokens! Use GreenWallet to access the investor's cabinet.

earnings.title: Opportunities with DAAR:
earnings.growth: Barter Trade: Exchange tokens for real products.

cta.title: Ready to Join the Agricultural Revolution?
cta.description: Invest in DAARION today and be part of the future of sustainable agriculture.

introduction.title: Empowering Technological Innovation
introduction.content: Ring is a cutting-edge digital platform designed to revolutionize the process of creating and showcasing technological projects. Born from the collaborative efforts of Trinity Ukraine, a Cherkasy-based IT company, and the Regional Development Agency of the Cherkasy Region Administration, Ring serves as a bridge connecting innovative ideas with the resources they need to thrive.

forWhom.title: Who Can Benefit from Ring?
forWhom.content: Our platform caters to a diverse range of technology-driven entities and collaborators:
forWhom.item1: Ukrainian technology companies operating across various cutting-edge sectors
forWhom.item2: International and Ukrainian businesses seeking synergistic partnerships within the Ring ecosystem

howToUse.title: Navigating Ring: Your Path to Innovation
howToUse.item1: Create your account: Sign up using your Google account, Apple ID, or Metamask wallet for seamless access.
howToUse.item2: Establish your presence: Add your company or organization to our growing network of innovators.
howToUse.item3: Share your vision: Post detailed offers or requests on behalf of your entity.
howToUse.item4: Harness AI-powered matchmaking: Our intelligent system analyzes your posts, adding relevant tags to connect you with ideal collaborators.
howToUse.item5: Engage with potential partners: Receive and respond to incoming chat requests from interested entities.
howToUse.item6: Explore opportunities: Browse the diverse array of offers and requests from fellow Ring participants.
howToUse.item7: Initiate collaborations: Start meaningful conversations with organizations that align with your goals.

techFields.title: Embracing a Wide Spectrum of Technologies
techFields.content: Ring supports a vast array of technological fields, including but not limited to 3D Printing, AI & Machine Learning, Biotechnology, Blockchain Development, Clean Energy, Cloud Computing, CNC Machining, Composite Manufacturing, Cybersecurity, Drone Technology, Electronic Manufacturing, Industrial Design, IoT Development, Laser Cutting, Manufacturing, Metal Fabrication, Plastic Injection Molding, Precision Engineering, Quantum Computing, Robotics, Semiconductor Production, Smart Materials, Software Development, and Virtual Reality. Whatever your technological niche, Ring provides the platform to showcase your expertise and find valuable partnerships.
